name: Walking under giant (remake)
description:
This is another project of mine, created years ago with blender but now i'm remaking and restyling it for Unreal engine 5,

this game is made for fun, there are no objective for now just doing what the title say,  Remember to set your settings and to read controls section in the menu.  This game is also playable with controller and watching it with the VR visor, but as first release there is work to do yet, VR controller aren't implemented to be used yet.

As free game i will share a new version more frequently

if you want to support me also for my main game with is BBG: the pleasure of the fight, you can find it here on my page, you can support with patreon too: https://www.patreon.com/trampleingame

NOTE!! for now you can spawn only:

- Belphemon - Coredramon - Devidramon - Dorugamon

THE CORRECT KEY TO ENTER THE GAME IS "ENTER" NOT "RETURN"
